name: OATC - Omni Aviation Training Center
about: OATC - Omni Aviation Training Center is a renowned aviation school with over 20 years of experience, certified in initial pilot training, type rating, cabin crew, and other aviation courses. Established in 1998, OATC is headquartered at Aer√≥dromo Municipal De Cascais Tires Hangar 1 in Lisbon, Portugal. The school offers comprehensive programs such as the Integrated Airline Pilot Course, Cabin Crew Course, and Flight Instructor Course, all designed to meet the highest international standards. With a team of highly skilled instructors, OATC provides top-quality training, ensuring students are well-prepared for their careers in aviation. Registration for courses is permanently open, and the school is committed to developing the technical skills and excellence needed for a successful aviation career. OATC prides itself on its long history of producing well-trained professionals who excel in the aviation industry.
services:

Cabin Crew Course

Flight Operations Officer Course"]
